entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 1:19 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:19 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 15.
